data.lyric:
[ti:Never Enough (《马戏之王》电影插曲)]
[ar:Loren Allred]
[al:The Greatest Showman (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Never Enough - Loren Allred
[00:07.94]Lyrics by：Justin Paul/Benj Paskek
[00:15.89]I'm trying to hold my breath
[00:19.69]
[00:21.66]Let it stay this way
[00:24.99]
[00:25.57]Can't let this moment end
[00:29.91]
[00:30.60]You set off a dream in me
[00:34.54]
[00:36.35]Gettin' louder now
[00:39.95]Can you hear it echoing
[00:44.65]
[00:46.49]Take my hand
[00:48.42]
[00:49.84]Will you share this with me
[00:52.92]
[00:53.86]'Cause darling without you
[00:57.18]
[00:59.73]All the shine of a thousand spotlights
[01:02.90]
[01:03.47]All the stars we steal from the night sky
[01:07.02]Will never be enough never be enough
[01:13.72]
[01:14.58]Towers of gold are still too little
[01:18.02]These hands could hold the world but it'll
[01:21.88]Never be enough never be enough
[01:30.55]For me never never
[01:34.66]
[01:36.42]Never never
[01:38.22]
[01:39.98]Never for me for me
[01:45.08]
[01:45.60]Never enough never enough never enough
[01:55.43]
[01:56.03]For me for me for me
[02:03.39]
[02:04.05]All the shine of a thousand spotlights
[02:07.01]
[02:07.59]All the stars we steal from the night sky
[02:11.00]Will never be enough never be enough
[02:18.24]Towers of gold are still too little
[02:21.65]These hands could hold the world but it'll
[02:25.53]Never be enough never be enough
[02:36.00]For me never never
[02:40.20]
[02:41.84]Never never
[02:43.69]
[02:45.46]Never for me for me
[02:50.99]Never enough never never
[02:54.60]Never enough never never
[02:58.21]Never enough
[03:00.75]
[03:01.40]For me for me for me
[03:09.82]
[03:14.21]For me
data.trans:
[ti:Never Enough (《马戏之王》电影插曲)]
[ar:Loren Allred]
[al:The Greatest Showman (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.94]//
[00:15.89]我极力屏住呼吸
[00:19.69]
[00:21.66]就让这一切维持原状吧
[00:24.99]
[00:25.57]不要让这一刻终结
[00:29.91]
[00:30.60]你与我一起放飞梦想
[00:34.54]
[00:36.35]此刻再大点声
[00:39.95]难道你听不到那梦的回响吗
[00:44.65]
[00:46.49]牵起我的手
[00:48.42]
[00:49.84]你会跟我一起分享这美好的时刻吗
[00:52.92]
[00:53.86]因为 亲爱的 没有你
[00:57.18]
[00:59.73]那无尽闪耀的聚光灯
[01:02.90]
[01:03.47]还有夜空中璀璨的群星
[01:07.02]永远不够闪亮 永远不够
[01:13.72]
[01:14.58]黄金塔对我来说依旧渺小如尘
[01:18.02]这双手可以拥抱世界 但这对我来说
[01:21.88]远远不够 远远不够
[01:30.55]对我来说 永远不够
[01:34.66]
[01:36.42]永远不够 永远不够
[01:38.22]
[01:39.98]对我来说 对我来说
[01:45.08]
[01:45.60]永远不够 永远不够 永远不够
[01:55.43]
[01:56.03]对我来说 对我来说
[02:03.39]
[02:04.05]那无尽闪耀的聚光灯
[02:07.01]
[02:07.59]还有夜空中璀璨的群星
[02:11.00]永远不够闪亮
[02:18.24]黄金塔对我来说依旧渺小如尘
[02:21.65]这双手可以拥抱世界 但这对我来说
[02:25.53]远远不够 远远不够
[02:36.00]对我来说 永远不够
[02:40.20]
[02:41.84]永远不够 永远不够
[02:43.69]
[02:45.46]对我来说 对我来说
[02:50.99]永远不够 永远不够 永远不够
[02:54.60]永远不够 永远不够 永远不够
[02:58.21]永远不够
[03:00.75]
[03:01.40]对我来说 对我来说
[03:09.82]
